about_the_game:
Outside Edges is the second collection of short fiction set in the world of cyberpunkdreams.

Four short stories set in the wider world of cyberpunkdreams, from abandoned oil rigs in the Gulf of Mexico to the wind-swept deserts of North Africa. From smugglers to corporate mercenaries. Learn more about what goes on outside the sordid borders of Cincinnati.

The collection comes in two formats: an illustrated PDF and a plain text EPUB for Kindle and other compatible devices. You'll be able to find them in the game's installation directory.

Please note: this is a book, and not in-game content. However, you will received 10 free credits to spend in-game with this DLC.

content_descriptors.notes: The book contains strong language, violent and sexual themes, but does not contain violent or sexual images or nudity.
